DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate long-term safety tolerability ABT-089 adult ADHD .
DOC.brief_title: A Safety Tolerability Study ABT-089 Adults With Attention Deficit-Hyperactivity Disorder ( ADHD )
DOC.criteria: The subject randomize Study M06855 complete treatment Periods 1 2 2week Extension Period If female , subject must either postmenopausal least 1 year , surgically sterile ( bilateral tubal ligation , bilateral oophorectomy hysterectomy ) , practice least method birth control throughout study If female , result pregnancy test negative The subject judge generally good health More 7 day elapse since last dose study drug Study M06855 The subject take ADHD medication last dose study drug Study M06855 first dose study drug current study The subject anticipate move outside geographic area
